field.name: Artesunate and Amodiaquine | Fixed Dose Combination
Each tablet contains artesunate (AS) and amodiaquine (AQ). The product packaging should clearly indicate which dosage applies to which age group
Each tablet should be taken once daily for 3 days, with meals
